name: NEON FIST
description:
Neon fist is a top down shooter where the player only weapons is a rocket punch that can only be launched ONCE before you have to collect it to throw it again. There are active and passive powers that affect your weapon and playstyle.

Be carefull! You cant even sustain one hit!

This game was made for the 2019 edition of the Game Makers toolkit jam, which theme was "Only one". Created by Pablo Campos, Marcel García, Clara Algara, Alba García, Jaime Salgado and Yeray Pachon. 

We had some issues trying to upload our game to Itch Io's page yesterday. We don't know why, but the project that we uploaded was empty. Because of that, here is a download link for it:

https://drive.google.com/open?id=1tEGuLZoEZHyhaiPH-RwRJXA_PDT2AB_D
